name: Animal Football
description:
Animal Football is a puzzle game featuring a half-hour cartoon about two animal football teams playing a game against each other. Gameplay in the original PlayStation release consists of slide puzzles as well a colouring activity.

The game was re-released as Animal Soccer World on the PlayStation 2 three years later. Two more minigames were added for the PS2: a Concentration-like card-matching game and some jigsaw puzzles.
